title: One Listener Is Calling Out A Bert Show Member For Their Pool Story!
description:
Last week K. Lee told us about a sticky situation he was put in. What was supposed to be a peaceful day at the pool, quickly turned sideways when his friend got into an argument with the lifeguard! Well a listener reached out with beef about this story. Listen...
